The building itself is called the Medlar Studio which is art deco style with a tiled facade. It is beautiful and I surmise was built around the 1920s. If you visit Toads coffee shop around the corner he will tell you the story of the fire that destroyed most of the downtown with the exception of the Medlar building, which survived the fire.
Spencer itself is a really comfortable town full of nice people. Its worth a stay!
